user.title: Connect to Bayrol Pool Access
user.description: Please enter your Bayrol Pool Access credentials.

select_controller.title: Select Controller
select_controller.description: The following controllers were found. Select one to add, or choose to add a controller by ID manually.

controller.title: Add Controller by ID
controller.description: Enter the controller ID. You can find this number in the URL when viewing your controller in the Bayrol Pool Access web interface.

controller_settings.title: Controller Settings
controller_settings.description: Configure {controller_name} (ID: {controller_id}). Enter the settings password if you want to modify controller settings. Each controller can have its own unique password.

init.title: Bayrol Pool Controller Options
init.description: Update settings for this controller. The settings password is required only if you want to modify controller settings.
